metadata.title: CVE-2022-21720 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Prior to version9.5.7, an entity administrator is capable of retrieving normallyinaccessible data via SQL injection. Version 9.5.7 contains a patch forthis issue. As a workaround, disabling the `Entities` update right preventsexploitation of this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
